data.message: Very disappointing, nothing in the top half of Scotland, nothing north of Dundee giving people 3 to 5 hours drive  making that a 6/10 hour round trip to the closest truck stop, yet knowing Christmas organisations in the north had asked for the truck to visit them.

replies.message: I'm very surprised they aren't coming to Aberdeen. Very disappointed!
Same here we're in Inverness so no way are we driving all the way to dundee and back!! Very disappointed.
Note they aren't going to Edinburgh either. Did the east coast do something wrong?!
They don't come to the Capital...Very stupid

I live right at the top near wick so if I want to go and see it I have to go to Dundee!!! You'd think they'd include somwhere in the Highlands, I'd happily travel to Inverness but not to Dundee! That's crazy lol
You can't get near it for a look anyway. We went and that many ppl go it's ridiculous. Your not missing much!
The advertisement on TV is what its about thats when you know it's christmas.Seeing a big red coke lorry face to face doesn't really do it for me.
Could be worse, you could live in Northern Ireland and have to get a flight.
